definitions.definition: An item of apparel consisting of a strap worn over the shoulder and used to hold up trousers.
An item of apparel used to hold up a sock or (now especially) a stocking , such as a garter , or each of the fastening-straps attached to a corset or suspender belt.

secondary_definitions: ( US ) An item of apparel consisting of a strap worn over the shoulder and used to hold up trousers.
( British ) An item of apparel used to hold up a sock or (now especially) a stocking , such as a garter , or each of the fastening-straps attached to a corset or suspender belt.
